lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: It is a dream come true: to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher I have the opportunity to meet new students every six months: it´s always a new and rewarding experience.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: The more you share and the more you give, the more meaningful your life is.
lender.occupational_info: I translate legal documents and work as an interpreter in court.

lender.name: ThePinballCompany.Com
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Well design game rooms and provide pinball machines, arcade games, and other game room items to individuals and companies.

lender.name: Liliana & Luís
lender.loan_because: We loan because we like to help others achieve their goals
lender.occupational_info: Liliana (Environmental Engineer) - Help everybody around the world with small gestures to save the environment. Luís (computer Engineer) - Help everybody with small gestures to improve technology over the world.

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: I like to invest on people. I believe that with faith, perseverance and given the proper conditions, everything is possible. I’m here to help with the conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I am lawyer, my daily life is all about helping people and being paid for it, my passion is doing it for free.

lender.name: Peachykeen Organics
lender.occupational_info: We make organic skin care using natural ingredients.

lender.name: Paulo Moura
lender.loan_because: It's obviouse that we all born with different chances. I am a previligiate because I had all the opportunities to make my own choices freedomly. I want to help people that had no chances in life to choose their future and having all that difficulties, still fight and make a future with hard work. I'm just trying to feel better with my conscience...

lender.name: paulo
lender.loan_because:
We definitely can't change the world by ourselves, but we can change a person's life. So, if we try, we can all contribute to make some changes in the world.
And i also believe in these old chinese proverb: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."
Lend :)

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I am a small businesswoman and I want to support other women with small businesses.

lender.name: Birgit & Niels
lender.loan_because: It's a small world

lender.name: Doba Kiva Fund
lender.loan_because: We believe entrepreneurship can change the world and people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: We setup this fund after our event in UT hosting Guy Kawasaki and our goal is to help fund over 200 businesses in the next 5 years.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I am a big believer in the power of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Business consultant for passionate early-stage businesses!

lender.name: Dorte
lender.loan_because: It gives me joy to lend a helping hand to these entrepreneurs that are building a better future for themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Ángel
lender.loan_because: You can bring hope to hopeless people.

lender.name: Princess Camille
lender.loan_because: I love. I create. I encourage. I share.
lender.occupational_info: I dance Argentine Tango with Scott. I create a beautiful, artistic life.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: because i can. thank you kiva for this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: - transitioning into international development

lender.name: Frederico
lender.loan_because: Comparing with this people, I'm a very rich person. I don't have the right to complaine with my life. Let help who really need.
lender.occupational_info: I try to minimize the physical pain and restore the confort of my patients.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: ...to assuage liberal guilt. No really, it's actually kinda fun and a good way to temporarily invest the excess of my student loans. "To whom much is given, much is required" -Luke 12:48

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: A small gesture can have a big impact.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: I want to help fund and support economies in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help people access free counselling services through their workplace.

lender.name: Katie & Shane
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe Kiva fosters hope.
lender.occupational_info: We work in the arts- theatre, broadcasting.

lender.name: Matt & Laura
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a pastor and work for a church. My wife and I run a business filming youth sports games.

lender.name: Håkan
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a better way to help people than just donating money to big organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I do research of how rain and groundwater affect the risk for landslides.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I admire the beautiful spark and spirit of survival in people. The entrepreneurial spirit is alive and well in all corners of the world
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have run a technology business for 20 years. We have about 25 employees and are very fortunate!! Being a small business, I do all kinds of tasks some very basic and some very important. No day is the same!

lender.name: Charlie / Julie
lender.whereabouts: On a sail boat In Honolulu HI
lender.occupational_info:
Charlie - Quality Control Management in the building construction industry and Hot Rod Builder
Julie – Registered Operating Room Nurse and First Assistant in surgery

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I wanted to get experience on a practical level. This is a very gratifying activity :-)
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business Cross-IT A/S, helping companies make best use of their Mac computers and other IT resources.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want my money to be doing something useful instead of sitting in the bank.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that run large auditoriums, conference rooms, and home theater systems.

lender.name: The Lone Lender
lender.loan_because: My girlfriend learned about KIVA on Oprah and told me. I always thought that if all the people in the world used a small amount of their money to help others it could make a very significant change and overall good. I just never found a way...until now. Kiva Rocks! I always re-loan my credit and give donations from time to time in order to ensure KIVA will grow and reach more people.
lender.occupational_info: Together with my colleagues i make ATM machines in Portugal. We are responsable for the assembly of cables, devices and tests prior to expedition.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Rakesh
lender.loan_because: i feel I need to do my part to make a better society for my kids
lender.occupational_info: I am a entrepreneur in the high tech world.

lender.name: Steven M Nielson
lender.loan_because: We support the Free Market enterprise wanting to thrive around the world. Personal ambition to make a change is key to personal freedom.
lender.occupational_info: We are an odd couple, an Engineer/Politician and a Teacher. We are actively involved in our community, and believe that the key to personal freedom is personal responsibility.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of economics and entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: Susanna
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me the tools to impact a community or a business directly. I have 100% trust that my loan will be used for great and noble things. And it makes me so happy to think about how my salary is helping another hard working, driven individual.
lender.occupational_info: I work for FRONTLINE, a very busy current affairs documentary television show, that incidentally featured Kiva in a documentary last season. I assist the executive producers and help to make sure everything runs smoothly! That means booking a lot of travel, writing letters, making phone calls, editing, and anything else needed!

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I want to help another person succeed.

lender.name: Ana Paula, Portugal
lender.loan_because: i feel good doing that.

lender.name: Chip
lender.loan_because: I can. And if YOU can, you should.
lender.occupational_info: I help NGOs design, develop, deliver, and evaluate continuing education to professional populations (architects, designers, engineers, surgeons, etc.).

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: I need good KARMA

lender.name: Peter Sommerfeld
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need to get by. And I bet these people can make better use of money than I can!

lender.name: boronat
lender.loan_because: I thought it was a good idea...people helping other people, and a little amount here can mean a lot there. But I was only convinced when my friend Javi said "This is the best thing I have seen in my life!"

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do :)

lender.name: Kirsty Mia
lender.loan_because: I have always been too generous to people that do not truly need, so now I have found a vehicle to give to those who do.
lender.occupational_info: Very busy. My name gets called probably thirty times per minute. It is very enjoyable to work with Early Learners.

lender.name: Hordur
lender.loan_because: prosperity starts with a small step.

lender.name: Denyse
lender.loan_because: Giving is a great way to feel good about who I am and a reminder that I am privileged to be able to give.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Aboriginal Health Workers in remote communities in Central Australia, helping them improve their English skills and updating social and emotional wellbeing skills and knowledge so that they can continue to help their communities.

lender.name: Till
lender.occupational_info: Studying Economics and Geography in Utrecht/Netherlands

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: I wish to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired.

lender.name: Joshua Francis
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people and families be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I put ads for The New York Times on the internet.

lender.name: Ron & Rachel
lender.loan_because: Anyone can give of themselves and everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in offices, but we love to garden and be outside.

lender.name: Joe & Jinette
lender.loan_because: We all need to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work underground in the mining industry, providing technical support to the production group.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand once in a while.
lender.occupational_info: I fly commercial airplanes and transport passengers across the United States.

lender.name: Re-modern.com
lender.loan_because: Re:modern is a small business, too, and knows how important it is to invest in good people, creating businesses that do good things.
lender.occupational_info: We sell home furnishings that look good, and are also friendly to the greater environment.

lender.name: Sra. D
lender.occupational_info: Soy profesora de español.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: This is in memory of my mother who believed anything was possible given the chance.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach physics to 16-18 year olds.

lender.name: Reed & Molly
lender.loan_because: it makes a direct impact on someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Molly helps young adults with disabilties & Reed works in marketing.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: This is such an incredible and effective way to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Pax - Susan & Rod
lender.loan_because: Think abundance! There is more than enough for everyone in our world to prosper if only we each play our part, with love and honesty, and without ego and greed.
lender.occupational_info: Susan is a computer analyst who works to reduce paperwork and bureaucracy while ensuring that human beings review essential information. Rod is a carpenter who works to build energy efficient housing in a sustainable manner. Pax is for peace in our world, and is also the name of our sailboat, built by Rod.

lender.name: Maki
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a degree in International Education Policy. I am interested in equity for and through education.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I'm running my own business and its hard. I'd like to help others with their busineses -- to see them succeed & make a better future for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in marketing & I am trying to build products to help active people manage their busy lives. My dog is Dakota & she does a good job in helping me with my business.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I believe small acts can have great influence.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: My family is secure and I have the resources.
lender.occupational_info: I set up training programs to help those in need of training.

lender.name: Teekam
lender.loan_because: I can I want to It makes sense
lender.occupational_info: It is not about me, it is about us together. Please, also see: http://www.vittana.org/ www.wokai.org

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I've been given so much.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a family with a large house and help maintain and orchestrate their busy household.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: It helps make things better.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lender.name: Kristian
lender.loan_because: I like to share with others... even if they're half a world away.

lender.name: Stephanie & Paul
lender.loan_because:
After reading Bill Clinton's book, I realized there were a lot more ways to give than my local community. Thru Kiva, I can really see and know I'm making a difference.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world. - Anne Frank
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that sells beverages such as bottled water, teas and sodas. My husband works for a technology company.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of others by giving them financial assistance, so they can make a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time student studying business management, leadership, and entrepreneurship. I am also building a forex trading business and involved in a software start-up company.

lender.name: Thomas Ausmus
lender.loan_because: I am blessed!
lender.occupational_info:
Financial analysis of commercial real estate assets throughout the United States.
http://www.commercialbloggers.com/
facebook.com/ThomasAusmus

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to improve their life. I believe I have been blessed and it is my responsibility to give back. It brings me incredible JOY to share in someone's growth and prosperity!
lender.occupational_info: I help people and businesses learn to use social media (like Twitter, LinkedIn, Flickr, YouTube, Facebook, etc.) to help create and strengthen their brand and increase their revenues.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Giving is always a good thing. It helps heal your soul.

lender.name: Layne
lender.loan_because: I believe in equity & economic opportunity; those of us in developed nations benefit from structural global inequities & should share -
lender.occupational_info: I use statistics & research to help public agencies in the United States

lender.name: anastassia
lender.loan_because: I love to give
lender.occupational_info: Making and selling handknit accessories and jewelry

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: A little support goes a long way when someone wants to change.
lender.occupational_info: I work with immigrant students learning English as a second language. I love my work.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Helping out one person at a time

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy way to give something meaningful back to the beautiful people struggling to make a living in the amazing countries I have visited in the past or will visit someday in the future!

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and want to be a part of it
lender.occupational_info: I am a salesperson for a large US corporation selling business to business services

lender.name: Ritchard
lender.loan_because: It is such a simple way to help, to touch another person's life, and to feel good about oneself. Thanks Kiva
lender.occupational_info: I don't understand it myself.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: It is my obligation.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility as a member of the human race.
lender.occupational_info: My work is not about my paid job, it's about how I live my life - from raising my son, how I treat other people, how I give to the world in order to make it a better place.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Our world view is too small and the world is so big. These loans enable people willing to work hard and honestly and gives hope in hopeless places.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Because it feels good to help others and lending a small amount of money can make such a big impact on other peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are buying a new home select their finishes like flooring and cabinets to personalize their home.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: To notice and enjoy everything around me and caputure it in words and pictures.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I know that every little bit makes such a big difference. I am a strong believer in Base of the Pyramid economics and I want to see those who are most in need get the chance to succeed.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I know how hard it is to get a loan from a bank when you need it most. I am happy to be able to help people who have no access to traditional credit.

lender.name: Hanne
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people, who do something to help themselve
lender.occupational_info: I help our customers getting started using computers in their business

lender.name: Kaye
lender.loan_because: I want the good people in this planet to succeed. Help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Relationship Repair.

lender.name: brekan
lender.loan_because: I want to earn some money ;-)

lender.name: Sarah & Simon
lender.loan_because: We live such a privilaged life in Australia, this is our way of helping people achieve their own dreams, while building a better future.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I was in the Peace Corps for 3 years and know the initiative and the longing for opportunity that characterizes many of our needy global citizens.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for protecting children from abuse and providing services to help families function better.

lender.name: Shay Martin
lender.loan_because: Micro finance empowers people to improve their lives and the lives of their community
lender.occupational_info: I am passionate about making people healthy and wealthy

lender.name: Sula
lender.occupation: second hand computer sales and repairer

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I'm having a hard financial time right now myself. When times aren't so good, I feel the best thing to do is to send out help to others that are even needier. I am fortunate to have been given so much help I would be remiss not to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I am driven to be an artist. Pay doesn't always support me but creating art has been in my soul since I was a small child. What else to do but follow my spirit?

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: This is simply a way to return the help I have received through the years. That and my belief that we can only build a better world starting from the ground up.
lender.occupational_info: I stain and topcoat doors, stairparts, and indoor trim for homes.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: this is such a great initiative! And so easy to be able to share in one's happiness and life.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: This way I have an opportunity to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to be a part of this wonderful program to lend help to hardworking people.
lender.occupational_info: I help deliver "Meals on Wheels" food to people who are housebound

lender.name: susana
lender.loan_because: These people don´t want charity. They just need a push, an opportunity!

lender.name: Dan Landrum
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a fair & equitable loan. And who better to offer decent loans to than the working poor?
lender.occupational_info: Computer Resource Specialist at UC San Diego

lender.name: Sébastien
lender.loan_because: I can do it
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage people who create softwares.

lender.name: Annquinette
lender.loan_because: I want to promote entrepreneurship within emerging communities. It's important to bring economic growth to these areas to maintain independence and their unique qualities rooted in their culture. If and when the Western world visits and buys their products and services, they buy a people's honor and sense of pride.
lender.occupational_info: This is my way to reach out and help someone else. I like to help build foundations that are firmly in cement but not in clay. Kiva gives me the opportunity to do that.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am naturally drawn toward people who want to help themselves. I am inspired by every single person I see on the Kiva website. They are strong, self-reliant and determined to more than feed their family. They have a dream like everyone else. I'm just doing my part to help them along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I help to diagnose heart problems or on the positive side, I help to prove that they have healthy hearts. I go to different doctors offices and use ultrasound to look at hearts. My other work is a home based business where I help to educate and keep people healthy and free from stress. I love people and love to see them healthy

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help to control what goods come into the US and make sure all the right taxes are paid.

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are a proven method of accelerating exponential change in the world, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Work: Building high-performing inclusive multicultural workplaces through training companies, employees and career activists.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We can change the world, one interaction at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I believe we should help people who are less fortunate, trying to improve their life and are willing to make an effort to do so.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping my fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: Wedding Officiant & Inter-faith Minister

lender.name: Casey and Lonni
lender.loan_because: I am able to understand how important self empowerment is. To see anyone succeed is truly rewarding and if I can help even a little bit, I am grateful!
lender.occupational_info: I am accountable for all technology solutions that deploy to our 201 retail stores. It has to be done with steadfast quality and ease of customer use.

lender.name: beskidniski
lender.occupational_info: Agroturystyczny Dom Gosi w beskidzie niskim

lender.name: Caspar
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people around the world and I like the concept. I think it is great you can follow your help and by helping true kiva.org, you are sure that the help gets to the right needed people and not i the pockets of some cruel dictator!
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer software in the financial industry.

lender.name: Nolan
lender.loan_because: People have supported me in my ventures - why wouldn't I do the same for others?

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: When I went through a really rough time, some kind people helped me and I will never forget that feeling. I hope to pass that on to someone else that just needs a little boost to help themselves and some day when they are on their feet they too will help someone.

lender.name: Panagiotis
lender.loan_because: Spread the wealth and the love! Peace!
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that create electronic maps and make them available on the web ... similar to Google Maps, but on steroids! :)

lender.name: Esben og Charlotte
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibilty for developing the poor countries and because we are fortunate and have the possibility to help the people who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can, at least a little.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature and writing at the University of Sioux Falls, a Christian liberal arts university.

lender.name: Sandy Meier
lender.loan_because: To help someone build a successful business that may change their family for generations to come is amazing! I am thankful for the opportunity to help in this way and I invite you to JOIN ME!
lender.occupational_info: I am very happily married and have three wonderful children. I own a business which provides website design and internet marketing services to clients in the US and Canada. I enjoy my work very much and love to help other business owners.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for the many blessings I have - I want to share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for people who cannot afford a lawyer with different legal issues. I am also a student of banking and finance at Boston University in the LL.M. program.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had help when I needed it in my life and would like to help others. I have also owned a small business and know how much hard work and determination is involved.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I Love To Help Other's And Have Other's Help Me, "We Help Each Other'.
lender.occupational_info: Want To Start My Own Courier Services, Moving Small To Large Packages In My Local Area. Have 15 Years Experience.

lender.name: Johann
lender.loan_because: I think the Principe behind Kiva is great. Nothing complicated – just people helping each other out.

lender.loan_because: when i look back on my life i don't want to think...gee i sucked!!!
lender.occupational_info: i make people happy.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is very important to help others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company, where I look after recruitment, development and welfare of employees.

lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is a very powerful way of creating sustainable grassroot economic development

lender.name: Stefano

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: we should all help one another when we can.

lender.name: Adam Harvey
lender.loan_because: Loans are more effective than wasteful grants.
lender.occupational_info: Quite varied.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant concept that genuinely helps people realise their dreams and ambitions
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Mirka
lender.loan_because: This is my way of helping people who are in need.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: Para comprar tela para la confeccion de ropa de bebes, somos una asociacion de mujeres que ayudan a restaurar a mujeres abusadas en violencia domestica
lender.occupational_info: mi trabajo es dedicado a poder ayudar a ensenar a otras mujeres en condicion de pobreza, y en abuso de violencia domestica, y asi ayudarlas a poder solventarse economicamente por ellas mismas

lender.name: Hutsi
lender.loan_because: just paying it forward ...
lender.occupational_info: My nonprofit organization helps people in poverty learn a living through education and short-term workforce training.

lender.name: elisa
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a change to really make their own living and approve their situation. I prefer people on difficult situations, whom chose to educate their children anyway.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping children and youht in difficult situations, when it is unpossible for them to raise up in their biological families.

lender.name: Mame
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm actually helping real people with specific needs.

lender.name: Haroon
lender.loan_because: I wholeheartedly believe in people being empowered by owning and running their own enterprises. Through giving loans I hope to help as many people possible in realising their aspirations.
lender.occupational_info: I do my best to put together a range of products for my customers that gives them the best possible value for their money.

lender.name: Glyn
lender.loan_because: It helps the global economy.
lender.occupational_info: My day job is Artillery, but in my off time I like to write short stories. Check out my site at glynshull.com !

lender.name: Millicent
lender.loan_because: Blessings are to be shared

lender.name: Brian & Sonja
lender.loan_because: We can, and you can too. Everyone in US and Europe should loan $25. Kiva is the perfect way to make something positive happen in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We help US software companies in the life sciences sector grow their businesses in Europe.

lender.name: BBfH c/o Greta
lender.occupational_info:
Building Blocks for Humanity started when a few volunteers from the Anne Frank Museum Exhibit in Albuquerque, NM decided they still wanted to see each other and do good work.
For seven years the group would have potluck dinners, through $5 - $10 in the kitty and kibbitz over dinner what organizations would recieve their funds.
Their mission statement was to support victims of terror or any organization bringing peace and a better life to the city, state, nation or the world.
The group has now become a simple supper group. Kiva.org was one of the last things they did. I have been charged with the duty to continue to give our 2 $25 donations to women throughout the world.
In addition to Kiva, this group has supported Madre, Naral, Righteous Christians (those that hid Jews in WWII), Friends of Mogan David of Israel, Heifer, and many more.
We hope our group will inspire others to do the same. And we're happy to continue re-gifting our money here on Kiva.org.

lender.occupational_info: I am an internet marketer and my goal is to motivate as many people as possible around the globe to enter the online community whether it is to start their own web business or simply to share their thoughts in a blog. lender.name: Lenore & Nuriel
lender.loan_because: Most of us have so much more than we really, really need. I feel very grateful that my $25 can greatly impact another person's life in a positive way.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people the chance to live a better life. The desire to live in a better world is useless without the willingness to give!

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the help that I've had in my life and would like to pass that on to someone else.

lender.name: marcolo
lender.loan_because:
People will work for a better life if given the chance. It transcends class and culture, as we are born under circumstances not of our own choosing. We can only try to make this life better using the gifts we're given.
Good is good. Kind is kind. Both begets both. Pass it on.

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: It is time to share. Finally in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We are opening a non profit restaurant using seasonal and local ingredients with one day a week as a pay if you can and once a month free.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
I want to do what I can to make the world a better place. It is my hope that the people who receive my Kiva loans are: a) Successful in their business and continue to build their business even through difficult times. b) Find ways to shape their business so it helps themselves and at the same time helps other people and also does no harm to other people or the environment. c) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to further their own education in ways that are focused on improving their business. d) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to advance the education of their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters). e) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to provide for their own retirement f) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to become a Kiva lender and make loans to others.
I believe one of the most important things that the people who receive my Kiva loans can do with their money after their business is running smoothly is to advance the education for themselves, their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters). It is my hope that the people who receive my Kiva loans are able to somehow find a way for themselves, their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters) to attend at least high school and 2 years of college leading to a High School Diploma and Associate Degree. Through education we are better able to understand and help ourselves, our family, our business, our community and the world.
If any of the people who have received my loans are having difficulty finding educational opportunities that they can afford that will help their business or they are having difficulty finding ways for themselves or their children to pursue a High School Diploma or Associate Degree then I encourage them to contact me and I will try to assist them.
lender.occupational_info: An electrical engineer is a person who designs industrial and consumer items that use electricity including computers, network appliances, radios, televisions, electrical motors/generators, electrical power distribution systems and communications systems. I am a vegetarian and I volunteer with the American Red Cross. Some of my hobbies include amateur radio, amateur astronomy, general aviation, yoga, meditation, ballroom dancing and Tae Kwon Do.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: We are all Gods children and have to help each others out ;o)

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Our country has an economic advantage that most of us take for granted. Even as a student, I can afford to make small loans which help equalize economically. It would be unfair for me NOT to participate with an organization such as KIVA.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I find joy in helping people become empowered to improve their lives.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: ". . . when you've been walking in the wind for miles, and you suddenly go into somebody's house, and he says, 'Hallo, Pooh, you're just in time for a little smackerel of something,' and you are, then it's what I call a Friendly Day."

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: I like to help people improve their conditions, in the name of Jesus and with the guide of our Lord's Mercy.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it is better than a handout and I am helping individuals that will help not only themselves but their communities as well.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I know that there can be good done with the extra money I do have.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of teenagers who are institutionalized.

lender.name: Terix Computer Service
lender.loan_because: We, the employees, managers, and owners of Terix Computer Service, want to do our part to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Terix is an independent, Silicon Valley-based provider of hardware and software maintenance services. We serve more than 900 customers in the US and around the world.

lender.name: Josephine Naomi
lender.loan_because: We want to help, but we've lost faith in the Big Aid Machine, where most of the funds seem to go to administration and salaries for celebrity endorsers. Kiva is exactly what we were looking for. We're getting our daughter involved by using her name and her image.
lender.occupational_info: We're a run-of-the-mill primary school teacher and university associate professor respectively.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I've lived in my car, showered at the YMCA, slept on a rented couch in a mobile home, and I've begged and I've borrowed - all so I could get an education (Ph.D in Chemistry) and change my future. I know what it means to have nothing but potential.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: we are

lender.name: Hamselv
lender.loan_because: Because I can

lender.name: Kim and Elvis
lender.loan_because: it is my duty to share some of the good fortune in my life.

lender.name: Rogério
lender.loan_because: I feel happy to help out someone... and it costs nothing (it's not like i'm loosing a lot of money, with the interest the banks are paying ;) )
lender.occupational_info: I Work in projects aimed at making areas in my company work more efficiently (by making certain tasks to be performed with the help of computers or other devices)

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: I've been exceptionally lucky in the opportunities that I've had in my life and I want to pass that along to others when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and program computers for Stanford University, a well-known private university on the west coast of the United States.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Love wins.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of California, San Diego studying history and politics.

lender.occupational_info: I work with my brother and help him manage a growing manufacturing business. We understand the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.loan_because: it is a way of directly lending a hand to people that need one.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a partner in a small law firm.

lender.name: Larry

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: There are people in this world that want to succeed. And given the oppurtunity can, and will hopefully give back to someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 9th grade Social Studies teacher.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: everyone should.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I want everyone in the world to have the opportunities to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We should BE the change we want to see in the world. Kiva rocks!
lender.occupational_info: I fix Nissan cars, get new ones ready to sell, change the oil and tires and service cars currently being used everyday. Now, some of my working wages can make a difference for someone world wide. How could one refuse such an opportunity? Now, religion is no barrier, politicians are no barrier, borders and languages are crossed with the click of a mouse! "Love your neighbor as yourself" can be demonstrated by putting your effort into action. Kiva is truly a beautiful thing!

lender.name: Meghan & Paige
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two children and I work in a doctors office helping out the doctor.

lender.name: Kadio
lender.loan_because: Others need just a little support to start a new sustanaible life by providing basic loan schemes.
lender.occupational_info:
We also serve as a charity humanitarian organisation empowering orphans, less privilege and war affected children through the provision of basic educational opportunities.
As Women Empowerment and Child Protection is at the heart of our Mission, we have initiated a Loan Scheme Project in Pastry and Cake Decoration for Teenage girls.We promote Children and Women rights through Short term trainings and other empowerment initiatives.

lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people
lender.occupational_info: I work for the provincial government in British Columbia, Canada. I'm in charge of hiring people for the government. For seven years I worked for the UN.

lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching and I am now selling for a Honda dealership.

lender.occupational_info: I am engineer in renewable energies

lender.name: John
